This is my first game review, and I am glad it is a good one. Personally, my favorite feature about this game is you don't have to play online all the time. You can easily play a campaign mode game against CPUs, which is not all that bad. The gameplay is great along with the graphics and a good weapon selection. The only thing I would say that is bad about it is it can be hard to find a multiplayer server to play on. 


9/10
